scripts.dev: concurrently -k -n WORKER,UI "ts-node-dev --project tsconfig.worker.json --respawn --watch cron --transpile-only cron/worker.ts" "next dev --turbopack"
scripts.start: concurrently --restart-tries -1 --restart-after 1000 -n WORKER,UI "node dist/cron/worker.js" "node -e \"const net=require('net');const{spawn}=require('child_process');const port=Number(process.env.PORT||8675);const s=net.createServer();s.once('error',e=>{if(e&&e.code==='EADDRINUSE'){console.log('Port '+port+' already in use; not starting another UI. (Set PORT to override)');process.exit(0);}console.error(e);process.exit(1);});s.once('listening',()=>{s.close(()=>{const bin=process.platform==='win32'?'node_modules/.bin/next.cmd':'node_modules/.bin/next';const child=spawn(bin,['start','--port',String(port)],{stdio:'inherit'});child.on('exit',code=>process.exit(code??1));});});s.listen(port);\""
scripts.build_and_start: npm install && npm run update_db && npm run build && npm run start
scripts.update_db: npx prisma generate && npx prisma db push
